titleStmt.title: A true confutation of a false and lying pamphlet entituled, A divelish designe by the Papists to blow up the citty [sic] of Oxford with gunpowder, on Thursday the 13. of January 1641.
titleStmt.author: Tolson, John, 1575 or 6-1644.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Io. Tolson vicecan. Oxon. deput., and 8 others.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
